name: Pinhook Bourbon War 4 Yr
description: Vertical Series is an opportunity to follow barrels, all filled within months of each other, as they age. Over the next 9 years, 150 bourbon barrels and 50 rye barrels to be blended and proofed creating the most balanced expression for the vintage.
tastingNotes: Bright nose of tropical fruit, butterscotch and cedar leading to a rich and vibrant palate of dried fig, cocoa, roasted peanut and clove.
mashbill: Made from a mashbill of 75% Corn, 20.5% Rye, and 4.5% Malted Barley (MGP sourced)

name: Bib & Tucker Small Batch
description: Like the 1880s that inspired it, boldness and refinement come together to create a bourbon thatâ€™s meant to be raised in celebration. Aged for 6 years in low char white oak barrels produces unparalleled smoothness.
tastingNotes:
Nose: Scent of strong vanilla and sweet hay and is accented by a whiff of sandalwood and mace.
Taste: Balanced with a hint of pecan pie sweetness, evolving into warm, rich, spicy sensation.
Finish: Long-lasting chestnut finish
mashbill: Mash bill of 70 percent corn, 26 percent rye, and 4 percent malt. (Tennessee sourced)

name: Nine Banded Wheated Bourbon
description: Wheated bourbon whiskey crafted from a unique blend of wheat, corn, and malted barley brought to life with limestone-filtered water from the Texas hill country.
tastingNotes:
Golden honey color, slightly viscous with a pleasant mouthfeel. 
A confectionary palate with notes of dehydrated stone fruit and fresh wood with a sweet long finish.

name: Belle Meade Sour Mash
description: Each batch of our proprietary blend consists of just 4 barrels and creates the signature flavor profile that makes Belle Meade Bourbon the award-winning Bourbon of choice for the discerning whiskey drinker.
tastingNotes:
Nose: Maple syrup and caramel with floral fragrances and a citrus zest.
Palate: Caramel and vanilla with bold rye spice and hints of apricot.
Finish: Long finish with mellow cherry and plum notes accented by Cinnamon.
mashbill: 64% corn, 30% rye, and 6% malted barley. (MGP sourced)

name: Chattanooga Whiskey 91
description: Whiskey 91 is a four grain straight bourbon which the company labels a Tennessee High Malt whiskey. The bourbon is aged for at least 2 years in two different charred and toasted white oak barrels before undergoing a Solera finishing process.
tastingNotes: Delivers a balanced, confection-rich barrel character, and harmonizes with the malty-rich spirit. Expect notes of dried apricot, sweet tea and honeyed toast.
mashbill: Yellow Corn, Malted Rye, Caramel Malted Barley & Honey Malted Barley
